content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I'm your AI assistant here to help schedule your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service. How can I assist you today?
Listen, I want to speak to your manager right now. This is ridiculous!
I understand your frustration and I’m here to help. Could you please tell me more about the issue so I can assist you promptly? If needed, I can escalate to a human operator for you.
I don’t want you, I want a real person! Now! This is urgent and I’m not wasting more time.
I will connect you with one of our human operators right away to ensure your concerns are properly addressed.
reason: Customer requested to speak with a human operator
